name: Drumshane House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed there for one night. Lovely spacious clean room. Lovely ensuite with gorgeous complimentary toiletries. The hosts Pat and Paul couldn't have been friendlier. Pat even drove us into town for dinner so we could have a drink and catch a cab home. A friendly local actually drove us home. Paul cooks a gorgeous breakfast. Would highly recommend this lovely B & B.
reviews.title: Great B & B

reviews.text: We shared the big room which is really pretty and clean... the bathroom is outside the room but very big and clean.
reviews.title: Nice B&B
BEST B&B/CHALET EVER
reviews.text: We had the chance to give food to the animals and enjoyed it a lot!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: If you're in Fermanagh this is the place to stay!

reviews.text: We spent one night here and wished it was more - very family friendly and made to feel very much at home - food great and everything we could need was catered for. Very clean and comfortable. Highlight for my six year old son was the little pups and a tour of the farm from Paul.
reviews.title: Home from home - fantastic

reviews.text: Many thanks to Pat for a warm welcome - we will be back
reviews.title: is a must to stay in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We both have just come home from staying in the Drumshane house chalet and we both can't wait to go back. We were so impressed with the chalet and its location in is central to all the main sites in Fermanagh.The chalet is immaculate and every need is catered for we had so much fun we ask Paul and Pat if we could extend are stay DON'T HESITATE BOOK NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: I will definitely go back

description: Drumshane House is located at the heart of Fermanagh's spectacular lakelands. Offering fresh, locally sourced food, quality accommodation and a breathtaking view of Ireland's most beautiful lakes and mountains. We invite you to come and enjoy our excellent service and see for yourself why our guests return time after time.
